### Bio



Hi, I'm Lino Licuanan. I am a product manager with stints in credit, web3, payments, and data products. I previously led product strategy for a $40M series A startup. 

I am well versed in data methodologies (R, SQL), and am graduating MSc Industrial Engineering @ UP Diliman by end of 2022. My passions lie with developing products that increase access to life giving services.

In my free time I boulder, go night running, and listen to podcasts.
